full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement: R000145386
=================================================================

### Overview

This Government of Canada tender opportunity is for a Business Continuity/Disaster Recovery (BC/DR) service, solicited under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement (SA). The objective is to engage a qualified supplier to provide BC/DR services to Shared Services Canada.

### Notice Details

*   **Reference Number**: cb-8697-86370936
*   **Publication Date**: 01 September 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 22 September 2023, 14:00:00 (ET)
*   **Tender Status**: Closed
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 16 October 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 15 October 2024

### Service Description

*   **Service Category**: Information Technology Service Delivery (81160000)
*   **Scope of Work**: This requirement is open to Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Tier 1 suppliers who have qualified under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement (EN578-170432). The selected supplier will provide Business Continuity/Disaster Recovery (BC/DR) services to Shared Services Canada, as outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

### Training and Contact Information

*   **Contact**: Krys Pikula, krys.pikula@ssc-spc.gc.ca, (613) 668-2207, 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, ON K2P 2H8, Canada
*   **Attachments**: None
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Notice Type**: RFP against Supply Arrangement

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

This is a closed tender opportunity, and all responses have been received.

†, DY -Zenitz†.
